pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Got2b Beach Matt Matt Paste 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

It's got to be got2b!
Get the surf style look! Whether tousled, dishevelled, tamed or straight - the main thing is it's matt. For surfer styles with medium hold 3, this matt-effect texturizing paste is right for you.

It's got to be got2b!
Get the surf style look! Whether tousled, dishevelled, tamed or straight - the main thing is it's matt. For surfer styles with medium hold 3, this matt-effect texturizing paste is right for you.

Use on damp or dry hair. Rub into your palms and tousle, twitch or flatten sections of your hair as you like.

From volume & shine to hold & spikes, got2b offers the right styling products for your individual look. It's all about expressing your style - show off your personality, individuality & attitude with got2b brand! No matter what look you're going for, you can get it with got2b products. You got2b you!

Made in Australia.

Jar & Lid can be placed in kerbside recycling bin. Jar & Lid can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details. Push Your Styling to New Heights

Suitable For: all hair types

Size: 100mL

Hair Type: all hair types

KEY FEATURES

• For surfer looks: get the surf style look!
• Matt finish
• Medium hold 3
• Texturising
• You got2b you!

Warnings

No

Ingredients

Water, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Isopropyl Myristate, Glyceryl Stearate, Petrolatum, Parfum, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, PEG-8 Beeswax, Phenoxyethanol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Benzyl Alcohol, Mica, Geraniol, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 15985 (Yellow 6)

Active Ingredients: Water, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Isopropyl Myristate, Glyceryl Stearate, Petrolatum, Parfum, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, PEG-8 Beeswax, Phenoxyethanol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Benzyl Alcohol, Mica, Geraniol, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 15985 (Yellow 6)

Directions

Use on damp or dry hair. Rub into your palms and tousle, twist or flatten sections of your hair as you like.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Jar & Lid can be placed in kerbside recycling bin. Jar & Lid can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
